title: Monitor error, displays out of range

replies.body:
I found the solution in a video a guy posted on youtube.

He wrote two scripts that will fix your out of range problems in no time.

i was playing lol in window mode for more than a year now and nothing helped me except his scripts.

Donated that guy a few dollars for his efforts.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xvs8sDnjBq4

This is a known bug in the 7.1 patch that affects some players playing under the Full screen mode. You should be able to bypass this by hitting **ALT+ENTER** in the loading screen after you've left champ select.

While this is an issue we're looking into, I can't provide and ETA for the fix deployment. Let me know if you have any other questions.

thank u sooooooooooo much, this solved my problem
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Would setting "WindowMode=0" to "1" in game.cfg also be a solution for an issue like this?
It could, so long as you make that change while logged into the client. ^.^

How so? I've done some game.cfg test modifications without being logged in, and those worked just fine.
_Still using the legacy client though, if that makes a difference._

I did set game.cfg to read only, just in case.
_We wouldn't want any "application generated" interference, now would we._
